title: Critter Shampoo
summaries: Critter Shampoo is a vanity accessory equipped in a social accessory slot that changes the color of summoned minions when paired with a dye in the corresponding dye slot. It is purchased from the Zoologist for 10 GC after completing at least 30% (162 entries) of the Bestiary.
The Critter Shampoo cannot be reforged, and therefore cannot have <linked>modifiers</linked>.

statistics.Buy: 10 GC
statistics.Sell: 2 GC
